TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit StronglyTypedResourceBuilder extends System.Object
public ref class StronglyTypedResourceBuilder abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供強型別資源的支援。

span.span: Provides support for strongly typed resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，資源會將程式碼分開應用程式的內容。Typically, resources separate code from content within an application. 建立和使用這些資源可以更輕鬆地開發可當地語系化的應用程式。Creating and consuming these resources makes it easier to develop localizable applications. 在.NET Framework 中，會耗用的資源通常使用類別，其中包含在執行階段提供特定文化特性資源的存取權的方法。In the .NET Framework, resources are usually consumed by using the class, which contains methods that provide access to culture-specific resources at run time. 如需有關建立和使用資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[桌面應用程式中的資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890)。For more information about creating and consuming resources, see [Resources in Desktop Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890). 強類型的資源的支援是藉由建立類別，可包含一組靜態、 唯讀封裝資源的存取權的編譯時間功能 (`get`) 屬性。Strongly typed resource support is a compile-time feature that encapsulates access to resources by creating classes that contain a set of static, read-only (`get`) properties. 這樣會耗用資源，而不是呼叫的替代方式和方法。This provides an alternative way to consume resources instead of calling the and methods. 強類型的資源支援的基本功能由類別 (以及`/str`中的命令列選項[Resgen.exe （資源檔產生器）](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md))。The basic functionality for strongly typed resource support is provided by the class (as well as the `/str` command-line option in the [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)). 輸出方法是，其中包含符合的輸入參數中所參考之資源的強型別的屬性的類別。The output of the method is a class that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are referenced in the input parameter. 這個類別會提供唯讀存取，來處理檔案中可用的資源。This class provides read-only access to the resources that are available in the file processed. ## Examples 下列範例會產生類別，名為`DemoResources`C# 或 Visual Basic 中寫入 （取決於範例的原始程式碼）。The following example generates a class named `DemoResources` that is written in C# or Visual Basic (depending on the example's source code). 這個類別是在`DemoApp`命名空間，且傳回的標誌點陣圖] 和 [應用程式名稱的屬性。This class is in the `DemoApp` namespace and has properties that return the bitmap of a logo and the name of an application. 範例會呼叫`CreateResourceFile`方法來建立必要的.resw 檔案，而且需要名為 Logo.bmp 的點陣圖檔案找範例的目前目錄中。The example calls a `CreateResourceFile` method to create the necessary .resw file and requires that a bitmap file named Logo.bmp be found in the example's current directory. 程式碼範例會使用名為 demo.resx 下列資源檔：The code example uses the following resource file, named demo.resx: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 應用程式程式碼接著可以如下使用此類別：Your application code can then use the class as follows: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/demoresources.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/demoresources.vb#2)]

summary.span: 產生類別檔案，其中包含與輸入參數中指定之資源相符的強型別屬性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are specified in the input parameter.

param.name: resourceList
param.span: 集合，其中每個字典項目成對的索引鍵/值組，是資源的名稱與資源的值。

span.span: An collection where each dictionary entry key/value pair is the name of a resource and the value of the resource.

param.name: baseName
param.span: 要產生的類別名稱。

span.span: The name of the class to be generated.

param.name: generatedCodeNamespace
param.span: 要產生的類別命名空間。

span.span: The namespace of the class to be generated.

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: 類別，提供將產生之類別的語言。

span.span: A class that provides the language in which the class will be generated.

param.name: internalClass
param.span: 若要產生內部類別為 ；若要產生公用類別則為 。

span.span: to generate an internal class; to generate a public class.

param.name: unmatchable
param.span: 陣列，其包含無法產生屬性的每個資源名稱。

span.span: An array that contains each resource name for which a property cannot be generated.

param.span: 一般而言，因為資源名稱不是有效的識別碼，所以無法產生屬性。

span.span: Typically, a property cannot be generated because the resource name is not a valid identifier.

summary.span: 產生一個類別檔案，而其包含符合指定集合中所參考之資源的強型別屬性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources referenced in the specified collection.
A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來產生這個類別提供的強型別、 唯讀包裝函式來存取的資源中所包含的`resourceList`參數。Use the method to generate a class that provides a strongly typed, read-only wrapper to access the resources that are contained in the `resourceList` parameter. 類別會忽略任何資源的名稱是以字元為"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 資源名稱"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是無效的識別項。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 資源節點名稱與 中的其索引鍵不相符。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來產生這個類別提供強型別、 唯讀資源的存取權中所包含的`resxFile`參數。Use the method to generate a class that provides strongly typed, read-only access to the resources that are contained in the `resxFile` parameter. 類別會忽略任何資源的名稱是以字元為"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 資源名稱"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是無效的識別項。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載可讓您使用`resourcesNamespace`參數來指定產生的資源命名空間。This overload enables you to use the `resourcesNamespace` parameter to specify the namespace for the generated resources. 在此情況下，產生的程式碼會出現，如下所示：In this case, the generated code appears as follows: ``` System.Resources.ResourceManager rm = new System.Resources.ResourceManager(".",typeof(baseName).Assembly); ``` 在大部分情況下，您不需要從您的應用程式程式碼呼叫此方法。In most cases, you do not need to call this method from your application code. 類別會忽略任何資源的名稱是以字元為"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 資源名稱"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是無效的識別項。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 資源節點名稱與 中的其索引鍵不相符。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來產生這個類別提供強型別、 唯讀資源的存取權中所包含的`resxFile`參數。Use the method to generate a class that provides strongly typed, read-only access to the resources that are contained in the `resxFile` parameter. 類別會忽略任何資源的名稱是以字元為"$"或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 資源名稱"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是無效的識別項。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string VerifyResourceName (string key, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider);
.method public static hidebysig string VerifyResourceName(string key, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyResourceName (key As String, provider As CodeDomProvider) As String
public: static System::String ^ VerifyResourceName(System::String ^ key, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ provider);
static member VerifyResourceName : string * System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider -> string

param.name: key
param.span: 要驗證的字串，並且在必要時，轉換為有效的資源名稱。

span.span: The string to verify and, if necessary, convert to a valid resource name.

param.name: provider
param.span: 物件，其指定要使用的目標語言。

span.span: A object that specifies the target language to use.

summary.span: 根據指定的輸入字串和程式碼提供者，產生有效的資源字串。

span.span: Generates a valid resource string based on the specified input string and code provider.

returns.span: 衍生自 參數的有效資源名稱。

span.span: A valid resource name derived from the parameter.

returns.span: 任何有效的資源名稱都會以底線 (_) 字元取代，但如果根據 參數指定的語言，衍生的字串仍包含無效的字元，則為 。

span.span: Any invalid tokens are replaced with the underscore (_) character, or if the derived string still contains invalid characters according to the language specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`參數有效的字元字串，該字串會傳回。If the `key` parameter is a valid string of characters, that string is returned. 如果`key`參數是無效的字串或字串，包含無效的字元，方法會嘗試產生有效的字串，根據`key`和`provider`參數。If the `key` parameter is an invalid string or a string that contains invalid characters, the method attempts to generate a valid string based on the `key` and `provider` parameters. 如果是有效的字串可以產生，，就會傳回字串。否則，`null`傳回。If a valid string can be generated, that string is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果`key`參數為空字串 ("")，傳回一個底線字元 (_) 所組成的字串。If the `key` parameter is an empty string (""), a string that consists of a single underscore character (_) is returned. 如果`key`參數不是空字串，方法會比較每個字元字串中無效的語彙基元所指定的語言為基礎的一組要`provider`參數。If the `key` parameter is not an empty string, the method compares each character in the string to a set of invalid tokens based on the language specified by the `provider` parameter. 以底線字元取代任何無效的字元字串中。Any invalid character in the string is replaced with an underscore character. 將會以底線取代的字元如下：The characters that will be replaced with an underscore are as follows: '' （空格），U + 00A0 （不分行空格） '。 '（句號），'、' （逗號），';'（分號），'|'，' ~'，' @'，'#'、 '%'、 '^'，'&'、' \*'，'+'、 '-'，'/'、 '\\'、'\<'，' > '、'？ '，' ['，']'，'' ('）'，' {'，'}'，'"' （引號），' '（縮寫符號），':'，和' ！ '。' ' (space), U+00A0 (non-breaking space), '.' (period), ',' (comma), ';' (semicolon), '|', '~', '@', '#', '%', '^', '&', '\*', '+', '-', '/', '\\', '\<', '>', '?', '[', ']', '(', ')', '{', '}', '"' (quote), ''' (apostrophe), ':', and '!'. > [!NOTE] > 強類型的資源不允許使用語言的關鍵字 (例如`if`， `for`，依此類推) 做為資源的索引鍵名稱。Strongly typed resources do not allow the use of language keywords (such as `if`, `for`, and so on) as resource key names. 不過，設計模式藉由使用語言關鍵字前面加上底線字元的關鍵字。However, the design pattern allows the use of language keywords by prefixing the keyword with the underscore character. 方法呼叫來強制執行這項設計的方法。The method calls the method to enforce this design. 例如，如果您使用的資源名稱，等同於語言關鍵字，例如`for`，名稱會顯示為`_for`產生強類型的資源類別中。For example, if you use a resource name that is the same as a language keyword, such as `for`, the name appears as `_for` in the generated strongly typed resource class.

span.span: or is .
